# SEQ32 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 32 focuses on fix the exact positions for openings and frame them

## Category
Construction

## Patterns
apl221, apl222, apl223, apl224, apl225

## Emergent Phenomena
Window and door openings positioned to support both structure and spatial quality

## Overview
This sequence contains 5 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
